main event: A former USAF pilot reported a near collision with a flaming object believed to be a Russian satellite while flying over Utah.
interesting points: The incident occurred when the pilot's airliner had to make a sharp turn to avoid a collision,The flaming object passed by the plane at about 17,000 feet,The object was traveling at approximately 600 miles per hour,The object came from the west and flashed by on the left side of the transport,The North American Air Defense Command acknowledged the incident and is verifying the pilot's report.
witness description: Lt. Cmdr. W. F. Norris, a former USAF pilot
